description:
Tree Preservation Application At:

10 Northampton Park, Islington, London, N1 2PJ

TPO Reference:

T17 Ash of LBI TPO (No.335) 2007 - REAR GARDEN OF 10 NORTHAMPTON PARK

T14 BIRCH of LBI TPO (No.335) 2007 - REAR GARDEN OF 10 NORTHAMPTON PARK

PO Number:

T090249

Work Specifications:

T17 Ash of LBI TPO (No.335) 2007 - Fell to ground level and replacement planting

T14 BIRCH of LBI TPO (No.335) 2007-Fell to ground level and replacement planting
decision_conditions:
The authority requires the replacement planting of the following trees to account for the removal of the protected trees listed below:
T14 Birch of LBI TPO (No.335) 2007 â€“ Replacement tree required White Barked Himalayan Birch
(Betula Jackmontii) or  Field Maple (Acer campestre)  to be located in a similar location in the rear garden of 10 Northampton Park to be agreed in writing with the local planning authority; 

T17 Ash of LBI TPO (No.335) 2007 - Replacement tree required from the following list: Liriodendron tulipifera (Tulip Tree) or Liquidambar styraciflua (Sweet Gum) to be located in a similar location in the rear garden of 10 Northampton Park to be agreed in writing with the local planning authority

The replacement tree shall be planted within one planting season of the tree removals
